body: The mom is the best woman ever in that Universe! If my though can reach you Author :"More of Erina!"
it's so weird that this is the only chapter of energy kyoka to go untranslated, they've translated later chapters than this one, like they just skipped it for no reason.
All time favourite chapter, the mom is a severely underused character, also seems to be the only one kyoka's brother actually wants to fuck.
holy shit the mom actually get fucked in this
